results.name: Number of closed walks of length n on the complete graph on 5 nodes from a given node.
link: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
Ji Young Choi, A Generalization of Collatz Functions and Jacobsthal Numbers, J. Int. Seq., Vol. 21 (2018), Article 18.5.4.
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (3,4).
formula: a(n) = A108020((n - 1) / 2) = 'ccc...c' (n digits) in base 16, for odd n. - _Georg Fischer_, Mar 23 2019
mathematica: CoefficientList[Series[(1-3*x)/(1-3*x-4*x^2), {x,0,30}], x] (* or *) LinearRecurrence[{3,4}, {1,0}, 30] (* _G. C. Greubel_, Dec 30 2017 *)
xref: Cf. A001045, A078008, A097073, A115341, A015518, A054878, A015521 (forms k=4^n-k). - _Vladimir Joseph Stephan Orlovsky_, Dec 11 2008
results.author: _Mitch Harris_, Jun 30 2005
